rz_local_community::text_card_0::text: Please introduce us to the Iranian experience in your country. Where do Iranians live? What unique experiences do they  have in your country? Take us to a restaurant, a grocery, or an art event.
rz_local_community::clip_card_0::goals[0: Capture an image of a typically Iranian place.
rz_local_community::clip_card_4::goals[0: Show us one more Iranian in your community.
rz_local_community::clip_card_1::goals[0: Show us what Iranians do in this place.
rz_local_community::clip_card_2::goals[0: Shoot a portrait of an Iranian, or show us two Iranians interacting together.
rz_local_community::intro_card_0::headli: Community Question- Where are the Iranians in your country?
rz_local_community::text_card_2::text: Thanks for your help. After you click 'Publish' on the next card, be sure to write a short description about your photo set. 3-5 sentences will be sufficient.
rz_local_community::text_card_1::text: Using no more than 5 photos, show us something about the Iranian experience.
rz_local_community::title: Show us the Iranian Community in your country.
rz_local_community::clip_card_3::goals[0: Get close, show us something typically Iranian.
